name: Time Travel Trio: Termityal Adventures Deluxe
name_original: Time Travel Trio: Termityal Adventures Deluxe
description:
Join the Time Travel Trio on their action packed adventure through the land of Termityal in their quest to stop the evil Malfluctionator and their henchmen from colonising the continent, This time with all new content and more levels to explore.

In this retro style 2D platformer, Race, Fly and fight your way through time in your quest to stop Malfluctionator and free the peacekeepers.
